titles.title: Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow nontaxable employer matching contributions to section 529 college savings plans.
Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of an employee amounts, up to $1,000, paid by an employer to a qualified college savings assistance plan for a designated beneficiary.
